modName: Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs - Blood Hound Armor Conversion
summary: This mod converts the body of the "Blood Hound" armor to match the body in my mod "Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs"
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u][b] Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs - Blood Hound Armor Conversion[/b][/u][/size]


This mod converts the body in the "Blood Hound" armor mod so that it matches the body used in my mod "Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs"

I found the original "Blood Hound" armor on a Japanese site and have no idea who originally created it. If anyone can let me know so I can give the creator their due credit, please do. The website said the creators are happy to let people edit their mods but did not state who the creators were.

[u][size=4]Required Mods[/size][/u]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente - [/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs by Kiehazzu - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60280/?
Original Blood Hound Armor - http://mitakusaner.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-359.html

[size=4][u]Not Required But Highly Recommended For Best Results[/u][/size]

Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?[/b]
[b]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/b][/b]
[b]High Quality Eyes by [b]Xenius - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?
[b]Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by [b]Rops1981 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23755/? (version 2)[/b][/b][/b][/b]

[size=4][u]Other Mods Used In Screenshots[/u][/size]

[b]Amazing Follower Tweaks by [b]Dheuster - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?[/b][/b]
Alternate Start - Live Another Life by [b]Arthmoor[/b] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/searchresults/?

[u][b]Install Instructions[/b][/u]

[size=2]These are instructions for getting a result pictured in the screenshot[/size]

[b]1) Install [/b]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente
[/b]
[b]During installation, select the "skinny" option, check the box that says "vanilla shape" and select the "Faces" option[/b]

[b]2) Install [b]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii[/b][/b]

[/b]3) Install [b]High Quality Eyes by [b]Xenius[/b][/b]

4) Install [b][b][b]Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul by [b]Rops1981[/b][/b][/b][/b]

5) Install Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs

6) Install Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy choosing the "skinny" settings and making sure "Eyes" remains unticked[/b]

7) Install the "Blood Hound" armor

8) Install Kiehazzu's Juicy Jugs - Blood Hound Armor Conversion
author: Kiehazzu
